did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Scrapbook with photographs, programs, tickets greeting cards, and other items; letters written home to her parents; and other memorabilia documenting her Cornell experience. Includes information about Vietnam War, civil rights protests, and other political activism; the name change from Home Economics to Human Ecology; sports and social life; Pi Beta Phi sorority; and her engagement and marriage to David Brooks.
